game.name: Atomic Brain
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, Strategy, Free To Play, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Steam Cloud
game.shortDescription: Immerse yourself in the dark, industrial world of Atomic brain, a dynamic shooter where every bullet counts, and survival depends on your reaction and accuracy.
